abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews performances by London Symphony Orchestra and London Symphony Chorus at Avery Fisher Hall as part of Lincoln Center's White Light Festival.
snippet: As part of the White Light Festival, the London Symphony Orchestra performed Beethoven’s seldom heard “Missa Solemnis,” on Friday, and Britten’s “War Requiem,” on Sunday afternoon.
lead_paragraph: As part of the White Light Festival, the London Symphony Orchestra performed Beethoven’s seldom heard “Missa Solemnis,” on Friday, and Britten’s “War Requiem,” on Sunday afternoon.

headline.main: Leading the March to a Mystical Place
headline.print_headline: Leading the March to a Mystical Place
headline.seo: London Symphony Orchestra at Avery Fisher Hall - Review
